Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Lamon
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temp rerouted via Diversey, Laramie, Belmont, Cicero & resume their regular route on Diversey due to street blockage near Diversey/Lamon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Laramie, Belmont, Cicero and resume their regular route on Diversey due to, street blockage near Diversey/Lamont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Bus services temporarily suspended downtown
ShortDescription: Bus services are temp suspended in the Loop from North Avenue and Roosevelt Road, and from Clinton Street and the Lake Front, due to protests/march activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Bus services are temporarily suspended in the Loop due to protests/march activity.

No buses are running from North Avenue and Roosevelt Road, and Clinton Street and the Lake Front. Some buses may experience major delays from congestion as routes approach this area and return back in the other direction.

Consider using 'L' service as an alternative through this area.
